Awful port of Half-Life onto the source engine. If you want an actual remake of the game, you're better off buying Black Mesa for a somewhat modern feeling game. Either that or you play the original, which doesn't belong in the source engine. Gold-Source is where it belongs.

Pros:
- You're able to load singleplayer from any chapter
- The water is transparent

Cons:
- Personally, I don't like the reflectiveness on literally everything 
- The movement is too fast and slippery
- Some scientists float in their chair they are sitting in 
- HLS Deathmatch is separate from the base game unlike the original

- This con is not so much as important, but if you really like b-hopping, you'd probably want to get the original instead. 

I have not thoroughly played through the entirety of the source version of the game, however what I can say is the movement feels very inferior to the original game, and it has many drawbacks that come to this port.

I have a whole hell of a lot to say about this game. Is it good? Yes, but it's got some issues. This game started out perfectly fine, and I had written a positive review with only about 3 hours on my belt, and it was pure fun. now with a solid 13 hours and a good amount of experience with bugs, I still enjoy the game, but I must insist if you want clean pure nostalgia and don't want something that goes as far as Black Mesa, play the original, this is fine, and has a lot of added benefits that are to be expected with an already great game being ported to the Source Engine. But that's all it is, a port, not that that's a bad thing, but the only thing this game has that stands out from the original is some of it's game breaking graphics glitches. At points it was so incredibly bad that my entire screen had been blocked out by glitched textures. And man, oh man The Gorge, the absolute worst part of this game. Now the section itself is fine, but at one point a Helicopter flies in and starts trying to nuke your ass like the US on Hiroshima, you have to shoot the thing with an RPG you've just found, only problem? The thing's hitbox is so small it's practically begging for you to make a dick joke about it. Now after a solid 45 minutes of shooting and loading my save, I finally gave up, went into God Mode and progressed to the next area. After that horrible experience, I've since experienced no more than the occasional graphics glitch. Overall, should you buy this game? If you can sit through a couple of lousy hitboxes, and graphics glitches, then go ahead. It's a pretty good game, I mean how bad can a port of the original be anyways?

HL: Source has a DirectX mode, which runs much better than original HL1's OpenGL mode on my laptop with old Intel integrated graphics. Recommended for this use case. And the shotgun goes "click-click" instead of "KACHUNK-CHUNK" when you reload it.

Честно, официальная Source версия Half-Life, не очень. 
И проблема в этом лень разработчиков. Если ранее игра нормально работала, то на сегодня появляются различные проблемы. Source обновляется, но про данную игру Valve забыли. 

Так же, разработчики настолько лениво отнеслись к переносу, что не стали делать трупы рэгдолами. А просто так положили на уровнях, просто как объект. А ведь могли, было бы неплохо.

Однако вы можете прикупить это, как контент для Garry's mod.

[h1]Half-Life: Source[/h1]
Wszystko dotyczące pierwszej odsłony przygód Gordona Freemana opisałem w mojej bardzo starej recenzji. Jako, że tutaj mamy do czynienia z małym remasterem wymienię elementy charakterystyczne tej edycji.

[h1]Co daje nam edycja Source?[/h1]
Jest to przeniesienie pierwszej części duologii na znany z drugiej odsłony silnik - Source. Poprawiono wygląd niektórych tekstur i modeli postaci. Dodali ragdolle, upiększyli wodę a także ulepszyli cieniowanie. Ponadto silnik Source wspiera napisy podczas rozgrywki. To niewielki remaster, aczkolwiek sprawia, że ta świetna gra wygląda troszkę lepiej.

Polecam tę edycję.

I've spent more than 350 hours in this game and can state responsibly - this game is a fucking mess. It may seem playable at the beginning. But in fact it's a total garbage. And here i'm gonna tell you why

1. HECU grunts won't deal you damage when you're looking 90 degrees up or down.
Not even a joke, bullets just won't hit you, you can pass ALL areas with grunts by looking on your legs (oh, i forgot - no fucking legs here). It concerns not only grunts, but also turrets, Barneys, massns - everyone who use bullets.

2. Crowbar bug from HL2
Remember this bullshit in Half-Life 2 when Combine Soldiers couldn't do anything against crowbar? Their melee animations just stucked, so you were able to kill them by spamming crowbar attack. In HL Source this shit works not only with HECU, but also with Alien Grunts and Alien Slaves. It's just ridiculous that one of the most powerful enemies become dumbass losers when Freeman takes his crowbar. Idiotism.

3. No damage from Tentacles
Funny as hell but you are not supposed to do anything to encounter this trashy thing. Just reach Blast Pit chapter and enjoy Barney fighting Tentacles for 1 million years. You have to be the luckiest (or unluckiest?) bastard ever to get hit by Tentacle in this game (frankly speaking, on the lowest level this chance increases). And you've paid money for this, ladies and gentlemen.

4. MP5 became useless piece of shit
Well, name of this paragraph speaks for itself - try to kill someone from MP5 at a distance more than 3 metres, see what happens

5. Fucked up reflections
You don't need flashlight inside the vent anymore since it's glowing like a goddamn Christmas Tree. Why? What does it reflects? Only Valve knows. Same thing with some other textures and especially with the water - sometimes it's HL2-like and sometimes just blurry translucent blanket. Looks awful and i don't remember such shit in HL2. New Source technology, huh?

6. Gauss=MP5
Yes, useless too because you can't hit almost any surface without getting damage. You're just too scared to use it. Well, at least this explains why had Barney killed himself with it.

7. Helicopter with fucked hitboxes
When i was trying to pass the entire game without getting any damage that cliff in Surface Tension chapter has spoiled my nerves damn hard since i weren't able to hit helicopter by shooting AT it. Only much later i understood that i have to fire UNDER helicopter. Absurd, isn't it? No, HL Source. Same thing for Houndeyes, by the way.

8. Anomalous Materials bug
Don't laugh guys, but there is a bug that doesn't let you pass through Barney after getting a HEV suit. I've always skipped this part, prefering to start from c1a1 but once decided to pass Anomalous as well. And what did i get? I've got a suit but Barney didn't open the door! What the fuck?! Imagine: you have bought the game and after 10 minutes of playing you're getting THIS! Hilarious.

I could write few more paragraphs, but isn't it enough? This game is ass. Believe me.
Buy it if you want Half Life maps in Gmod otherwise buy Black Mesa.

This is probably the definitive way to play HL1 (almost), or at least my most preferred way. It keeps the aesthetic, while adding the elements from HL2, like water or ragdoll physics. Plus the sounds don't make you go deaf anymore. Black Mesa is great and all, and i highly recommend, but i guess in my own sadistic way, i prefer the original aesthetics over that.

However, i did encounter a bug that would crash my game when i would enter the next level (after rocket launch into space), and made my autosave corrupt. It did it again, and would corrupt the second autosave (this game has 2 autosaves). So i had to replay 2 levels, because that's the last time i manually saved. The crash hasn't happened again since then, and i have successfully managed to finish the game, but i did see a lot of reviews saying that HL1 source is very buggy since 2013 patch, and apparently most bugs have no solutions.
It's Half-Life but shinier. Honestly, with Black Mesa's existence, there isn't a purpose for this game. Either play the original or the awesome fan remake, not the simonized version.

Despite being called a [i]"digital remaster"[/i], Half-Life: Source is littered with bugs left and right, to the point of where important cutscenes are entirely broken.

VALVe's lack of support to fixing these bugs is a pretty telling point that this game is completely abandoned and that any (if not all) future Source Engine SDK updates will ultimately break this game more.

If you are someone who wants to play Half-Life in its former glory, play the original or the fan remake [i]"Black Mesa"[/i].

If you're someone who got this game as part of the VALVe bundle and genuinely wants to make the most of it, consider checking out [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2512649478]this guide[/url] to properly install a mod that fixes a lot of the issues.

If it makes you feel any better though, owning this game does let you use HL:S assets in GMod, so it wasn't entirely worthless.

Kötü bir remake almayın.2004 yılında Valve'in bütün eski oyunlarının yanına Source ismini getirdiği dönemlerden kalma.Grafiklerde hiç bir değişme yok.Source ile uzaktan yakından alakası yok.Fizik motoru bile Gold Source.He aynı zamanda o bugları ve glitchleri es geçmeyelim.Bunu alacağınıza gidin adam gibi Half-Life alın hem multiplayer'ı da var.Yok ben güzel grafiklerde oynayacağım diyorsanız gidin asıl Source grafik ve oyun motorunu kullanan Black Mesa'yı alın.Gerek yok yani

Wisely done, Mr. Freeman. I will see you up ahead.

PROS: As stated in my previous review, nearly every piece of this game can be considered a positive.  The gameplay is tight, and the weapons give a 'mere' physicist the feel of an almost immortal powerhouse.  The soundtrack plays haunting and spine tingling tones at the proper moments, and the sound effects each have a solid kick to them.  The aliens are all designed in a way to be unfamiliar rather than terrifying, giving them an otherworldly feel without making them feel undefeatable.  The story, of course, is the clear shining point, taking a first person narrative with no interaction of the player, and giving it a sense of scope and agency that makes you question what else was going on behind the scenes, what deals were undertook while Dr. Freeman helped begin the resonance cascade.  And most importantly, the Source version takes minor improvements to polish the game up even more.

CONS: Although the action shift can be a small turnoff, the major issue comes from first person platforming, creating a sense of unease upon dropping into an environment that one hopes their feet just happen to exist in today.

FINAL: Half-Life is one of the games that defined the path to modern FPS games, and even other genres.  It's powerful mix of gameplay into the story creates an experience that must be played to truly see everything it did, highlighting some of the best parts of classic FPS gameplay.  In my opinion, a must play for any fan of FPS games.

На момент релиза движка Source и работающей на ней HL2 студия Valve зачем-то решила портировать первую часть на новый движок.

Получилось... спорно. )))) В ремейке остались те же самые модели, текстуры и звуки. И это спустя шесть лет после выхода оригинальной HL. 

Может быть, меня не поймут сегодня, т.к. меду играми 2019 и 2013 года может не быть такой сильной разницы в технологиях (см, например, ремастер первой Borderlands). Все зависит от того, насколько технологически передовую серию шутеров обсуждаем.

Тогда Half-Life была графически передовой серией, движок Source в 2004 задал стандарты на годы вперед. Жаль, что HL: Source не продемонстрировала его возможностей. Полноценный ремейк делают вот уже больше 14 лет и никак не могут доделать финальную главу, ждем!

I make this review as an expression of my opinon, doesn't mean mine or others are right, i just want to share my expirence of the game. As someone who has played, and replayed, and loved the sh*t out of, the orignal half life i can understand some peoples opinions of HLS, from a purist standpoint i'd agree, the game has nasty bugs, but none of its problems out shone what i personally enjoyed in the game. Playing Half Life Source for the first time made me feel like i was playing this game i had beat dozens of times for the first time again, i thourolly enjoyed the game and would recommend it, without of course denoucing the orginal, but i find myself playing this version more often for the little things. If you are a purist i'd agree with avoiding it, but if your a casual fan, long time, or otherwise. I'd still recommend it

Half-Life: Source курильщика.

Это лишь натягивание движка Source на скелет из прежних ассетов игры. Смысла выкатывать такое ради улучшенного освещения, шейдеров водички, частиц и ragdoll-физики не вижу, хватило бы и техно-демки в виде начального уровня. По хорошему, как минимум надо было дорабатывать все модели персонажей, декорации, анимации, под графику 2004 года. Поэтому желание фанатов увидеть полноценный ремейк, коим и является Black Mesa, вполне оправдано.

[h1] ПРЕДИСЛОВИЕ [/h1]
Что ж  я не знаю. 
Half-Life:Source-порт Half-Life 1 на Source и довольно кривой порт даже не смотря на графику а из-за геимплея [spoiler] автор в изумлении,не знает что сказать-в плохом смысле. [/spoiler]
Итак разберем плюсы и минусы.

[h1] ПЛЮСЫ [/h1]

1.Картинка при освещении немного стала приятней + оружия стали немного лучше выглядеть.
2.Физика тел приятная также не столь плохо выглядит брызги крови людей и пришельцев.[spoiler] Автору так и хочется заспавнить NPC-и и наслаждаться физикой и брызгами крови... [/spoiler]
3.Качество воды лучше стало.
4.Можно ухудшить графику [spoiler] несмотря на то что она далеко не unreal engine 4 [/spoiler]

[h1] МИНУСЫ [/h1]

1.Большинство лазерных мин не имеет коллизий [spoiler] ДАЖЕ НЕ ПЫТАЙТЕСЬ НА НИХ ЗАПРЫГНУТЬ ДО КАРТЫ С ЗАМИНИРОВАННЫМ ЗДАНИЕМ [/spoiler]
2.Нельзя 2 раза использовать экстренную кнопку открывании двери.
3.Некоторые скрипты NPC ломаются  и в последствие чего пришлось проходить заново.
4.Нельзя расчленить труп. 
[h1] ВЫВОД [/h1]
Это скорее всего далеко не все минусы т.к. я не полностью проходил.
[spoiler] ТАК КАК АВТОР НЕ ХОЧЕТ ИГРАТЬ В HALF-LIFE:BIG BUG [/spoiler]
[u] АВТОР НАСТОЯТЕЛЬНО  РЕКОМЕНДУЕТ ИГРАТЬ В ОРИГИНАЛ ИНАЧЕ... [/u]

This port of Half-Life is completely awful. It is a bug ridden mess and it boggles my mind that it was made by Valve. If you want to experience Half-Life properly then just buy the original or at the very least buy Black Mesa, a very slightly better Half-Life Source Engine remake. Giocato in difficile è anche meglio perchè sei obbligato a fare più attenzione e impegnarti un po', il che lo rende ancora migliore.
Super consigliato

Half-Life.....
Ein Meilenstein der Spielegeschichte. Hier spreche ich von einem Spiel, welches packender und spannender nicht hätte sein können! Wer damals ebenso mit dabei war, diesen Fortschritt in der Spielewelt, wie auch die endlos lange Story genießen durfte, der weiß wovon ich spreche!
Das es noch längst keinen dritten Teil, nach diesen beide KULTSPIELEN gibt, ist mir bis heute ein Rätsel. 

Erstmalig schlüpft man in die Rolle eines Herren, wo man erst friedlich im Core unterwegs ist, bis....wie kann es auch anders sein, etwas gewaltig schief läuft! Von dort an, ist man dabei, eine absolute Berg und Talbahn zu erleben! Im Komplex den Gegnern zeigen, wer Freeman mit der Brechstange ist, den Soldaten gehörig Granaten um die Ohren feuern und jede Menge Kreaturen ausschalten , die mehr Alien nicht sein können! Auch wenn die Grafik heute etwas in Richtung Minecraft geht, so war und ist dieses Spiel Wegbereiter und hat nicht umsonst einen Kultstatus verdient! Viele Spiele sind in deren Fußstapfen getreten, nur das die Story etwas anders ist! Ob nun DooM3 oder Alien: Isolation und Colonial Marines. Es gibt noch viele weitere Beispiele und wenn hier nochmal Errungenschaften eingepflegt werden würden, so würde ich HL noch ein 9.Mal durchackern!

Von mir 9/10 Aliens machen mit Mr.Freeman Bekanntschaft!

pretty much the same game but with better graphics/lighting and some more bugs, like how the tentacle thing in the silo doesn't do any damage 90 percent of the time

not bad but play the original if you're a purist

Не приносит того же адреналина, что оригинал.

[h1]Что понравилось?[/h1]
HD текстур пак. В ремастере он смотрится очень хорошо, нежели чем в оригинале.
Еще меня впечатлило, что переработали двенадцатую главу в каньоне. Там теперь не просто скайбокс, как было в оригинале, а полноценные 3д модели на бэкграунде.

[h1]А теперь о минусах[/h1]
Спекулярные карты на некоторых объектах смотрятся очень неестественно.
Освещение тоже местами ненатурально. Где-то очень темно, где-то преобладают оттенки желтого.
Понерфили некоторые баги оригинала, появились новые. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
Артефакты в десятой главе c конвейерами. Проходил почти что в слепую.

[h1]В итоге[/h1]
Атмосфера совсем не та, что была в оригинале. Да и вообще, в чем был смысл переноса игры на движок соурс? Чтобы просто показать, что вы можете? Если вы делаете ремастер, то делайте нормально, а не просто добавьте пару эффектиков без переработки моделей и текстур. Ужасный ремастер.

An OG Valve shooter with OG mechanics. Start world, [spoiler] encounter dilemma, traverse world, fight boss, [/spoiler] win. EZPZ. Don't expect anything pretty and detailed. Most NPCs have the lines from the same voice actors, you can count the polygons (not really, but you can definitely see them), and the game is pretty linear. Get the Source version, though. It's easier on the eyes.
Like the original but better
